backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with user profile auth, single-product storage, and CRUD operations gated by AccessControl and mixins.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and PWA metadata.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and startup behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration for storefront and admin routes with theming and toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLayou: Admin layout with header navigation, login, profile setup, main outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Protects admin routes by checking Internet Identity auth and admin permissions.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users to set up their admin profile name.
frontend/src/components/checkout/Checkou: Checkout form handling customer info, validation, payment selection, and order creation via mutation.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Loada: Image component that preloads product images and shows a placeholder until loading completes or fails.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Produ: Displays a product card with image, name, description, price, and availability, linking to the product page.
Renders a main product image with selectable thumbnails, falling back to a placeholder when needed.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Quant: UI control for incrementing or decrementing a numeric quantity within optional bounds.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Store: Main storefront layout with header, navigation, cart indicator, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin-oriented hooks for checking admin status and performing product and order mutations using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, storing identities, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for products, orders, and user profiles, including mutations and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with gold-accented color palettes.
frontend/src/lib/deliveryFee.ts: Contains delivery fee utilities, currently returning a flat fee of 200 Rs per order.
frontend/src/lib/orderStatus.ts: Maps order status values to display labels and badge variants for UI rendering.
frontend/src/lib/payment.ts: Provides payment method labels, manual payment helpers, and EasyPaisa/JazzCash instructions.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Builds WhatsApp-ready order messages and links based on order details and payment method.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Admin view for a single order with controls to verify payment, confirm, deliver, or cancel the order.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Lists all orders for admins with customer info, totals, status, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductEdi: Form for creating or editing a product with fields for name, description, price, images, and active status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product list with images, price, status, and actions to create, edit, or deactivate products.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart UI, allowing quantity changes, item removal, and showing an order summary.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays the product catalog with loading and error states using data from active products query.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Shows the checkout form when the cart has items and redirects empty carts back to the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with hero banner and feature sections linking users to the product catalog.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details, customer info, items, and payment summary with WhatsApp contact and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and shows product details with image gallery, quantity selector, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Implements a persistent Zustand store for cart items with add, remove, quantity update, total, and count helpers.
frontend/src/utils/productImages.ts: Provides utilities for normalizing product image URLs and overriding images for specific known products.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash-based routing compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, typography, container queries, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, goals, constraints, known issues, and product catalog details for the iMazu PWA.
